ValidationRule.description: Based action from the AssetTrigger the Support Ref Obj Current Step will be set to Cancelled in Support. A "person" should not set this value, it is based on the Plan Cancel Date set by HRIS. A user with the profile of 2008-2009 Ops Admin may update this
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordTypeId='01270000000UJwJ', ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c , 'Cancelled In Support'))&& ( NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name, 'System')) && NOT($User.ProfileId = '00e700000013gAF') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Current Step cannot manually be set to Cancelled in Support. Please choose another value before you can save the record.
